issue.title: [CF 1210] Change timer numbers font size.
issue.body:
Is there a way to change timer numbers font size on icon?


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad | Imported from CurseForge issue #1210 | Raw

comments.body:
What provider are you using for your timer texts? OmniCC? The Blizzard built-in timers? Or some other addon?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

OmniCC. Sorry for I didn't mention it.

Edited May 20, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad

Try OmniCC's options?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
